[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1320406][img]https://i.imgur.com/9Awo1gf.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Various Fixes Made This Week[/b][/color]
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9998FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] has steadily made fixes to the newly upgraded forum this week. For starters, he squashed a bug with the IP login history feature that has been occurring since May but had gone unnoticed. You can read more about it in his thread [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5748921]here[/url]. He also disabled the feature where group owners were receiving email notifications every time a new member applied for a group via User CP.  The last fix we'll cover is the YouTube MyCode tag used for embedding videos in posts, which is now fully functional. You can follow [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9998FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] on his journey via the [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5741402][b]HF Features Broken[/b][/url] thread.

[color=#FFFFFF][b]New Navigation Menu[/b][/color]
If you have been browsing Hack Forums this week, you will notice that there is a new navigation menu at the very top of the page. This was added after the removal of [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9998FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]'s previous hamburger menu experiment. This new menu is another step toward his goal of making the forum mobile-friendly.

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Wiki Link Added to Navigation Menu[/b][/color]
A link to the official Hack Forums Wiki has been added to the navigation menu under the Help category. This is the first time since [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9998FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]'s [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5740983][b]HF Writers Group and Wiki DELETED[/b][/url] thread that members receive any additional news on the Writers group. With the link being added to the navigation menu, we assume that the Writers group will make a comeback.
